nodes.text: The Belsallian Cantina was a cantina located in the city of Carannia on Serenno. Patrons of the cantina were advised to arm themselves with weapons due to its disreputable nature. The Sith apprentice Asajj Ventress visited the cantina while searching for Jenza, the sister of her Master, Count Dooku.

The Belsallian Cantina first appeared in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. It shares the name of the Belsallian Sea, which first appeared in the Star Wars Legends comic Agent of the Empire – Hard Targets 1.
